name: BATTLE X Arcade
description: BATTLE X Arcade is an arcade version of BATTLE X, which is specifically developed for LBE(Location Based Entertainment) venues
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 64bit Processor: intel Core i5 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce GTX 970 DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 4 GB available space Sound Card: - Additional Notes: -
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7/8/10 64bit Processor: intel Core i7 Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce GTX 1070 DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 4 GB available space Sound Card: - Additional Notes: -
